nycTheatreExcerpt: Ultimately, it is the cast that makes the Seaview memorable. The play is a true ensemble showcase, with the adult sisters and their younger counterparts hitting all the stops... Butterworth's portrayal of grief and the memories people choose to remember  and forget  is moving, and worth checking into the Seaview (the Broadhurst Theatre) to experience.
